title: 2 Bedrooms / 2 Baths Newly Remodeled Upper level condo for rent
posting_body: 2 Bedrooms/2 Baths Upper Level condo unit, fresh paint, dishwasher, garbage disposal, New refrigerator, New range, swimming pool/gate, near parks & Shopping Mall.
Located 10 minutes from BART, close to freeway access (280 & 380) .
Next to You Tube & Wal mart and No need to drive.
One car Port & one extra parking with Permit.
Renter's Insurance and adherence to HOA rules and regulations is mandatory
